[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ background_color=”#000000″][et_pb_fullwidth_code _builder_version=”3.19.10″ text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”0px|||” custom_padding=”0px|||” custom_css_main_element=”margin-top:-100px;”]

Experience [/et_pb_fullwidth_code][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ disabled_on=”on|on|” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ background_color=”#0f0f0f” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#333333″ background_color_gradient_end=”#0f0f0f” background_color_gradient_direction=”90deg” background_size=”contain”][et_pb_row module_class_1=”overlay-text” module_class=”box-img-right” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ background_image=”https://thevocalstars.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/experiance-bg.png” background_size=”contain” module_alignment=”center” animation_style=”fade”][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Industry Leaders” _builder_version=”3.22.7″ header_2_text_color=”#877dc2″ background_layout=”dark” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”left”]

Industry Leaders

At Vocal Star, you will be working with industry leaders that have worked with talent and shows like KIDZ BOP, THE VOICE, AMERICAN IDOL, DISNEY, NICKELODEON, RIVERDALE AND IN CONCERTS ACROSS AMERICA AND AROUND THE WORLD!!

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”#experience” button_text=”Learn More” button_alignment=”center” admin_label=”Learn More” module_class=”bg-purple” _builder_version=”3.19.10″ animation_style=”zoom”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ disabled_on=”||on” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ background_color=”#0f0f0f” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#333333″ background_color_gradient_end=”#0f0f0f” background_color_gradient_direction=”90deg” background_image=”https://thevocalstars.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/male-singer.jpg” custom_padding=”0px||0px|”][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ custom_padding=”75px|20px|75px|20px” module_class=” et_pb_row_fullwidth” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ background_color=”rgba(51,51,51,0.82)” background_size=”contain” width=”100%” width_tablet=”100%” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” max_width=”100%” max_width_tablet=”100%” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_alignment=”center” animation_style=”fade” make_fullwidth=”on”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Industry Leaders” _builder_version=”3.22.7″ header_2_text_color=”#877dc2″ text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”left”]

Industry Leaders

At Vocal Star, you will be working with industry leaders that have worked with talent and shows like KIDZ BOP, THE VOICE, AMERICAN IDOL, DISNEY, NICKELODEON, RIVERDALE AND IN CONCERTS ACROSS AMERICA AND AROUND THE WORLD!!

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”#experience” button_text=”Learn More” button_alignment=”center” admin_label=”Learn More” module_class=”bg-purple” _builder_version=”3.19.10″ animation_style=”zoom”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ module_id=”experience” module_class=”full-screen” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ background_color=”#333333″ background_image=”https://thevocalstars.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/microphone-bg.jpg” parallax=”on” parallax_method=”off”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.22.3″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.22.7″ header_2_text_color=”#00a2c3″ background_layout=”dark”]

we’ll teach you the craft

Industry professional Q & A’s, song selection, image development, recording, performances, media training.

You will have the opportunity to:

  • Film a Music Video on set with film crew, lights & cameras.
  • Record a cover or original song with multi-platinum and Grammy Award winning producers and songwriters.
  • Online branding and marketing.
  • Dance and Movement.
  • Directed and taught by top producers and famous recording artists.
  • Workshops with Celebs, Producers & Casting Dir.
  • Rehearse and work with celebrities, top choreographers, and producers in Music and Film & TV!
  • Book Meetings with Music Industry Experts.
  • Perform for the TOP Agents, Managers, and Record Labels for possible professional representation.
  • Live televised performances.

At Vocal Star we really want to help you jump-start your craft. We will get you on the fast track. You bring the talent and the voice, we’ll teach you the craft, and get you prepared to become an insider and a success in the music business.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
